movies.title: In the Valley of Elah
movies.plot: A career officer and his wife work with a police detective to uncover the truth behind their son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 22 nominations.

events.title: Richard Davis, who Mike Deerfield is based on, is killed
